hero.title: Enjoy Baseball with Kids in Tokyo!
hero.subtitle: Welcome to Sakura Baseball Club where we foster children's growth and friendship

1.title: Welcome to Sakura Baseball Club
1.description: A community-based baseball club fostering children's growth and friendship

2.title: Practice Sessions
2.description: We practice every Saturday and Sunday

3.title: Games
3.description: Gain practical experience through games with other local teams

about.title: About Us
about.description: Sakura Baseball Club is a youth baseball team based in Koto Ward, Tokyo. Established in 2010, we focus not only on improving baseball skills but also on developing children's physical and mental growth, teamwork, and sense of responsibility. Currently, we have about 40 players from grades 1 to 6.

practice.title: Practice
practice.description: We provide thorough instruction from the basics to support each child's growth.

matches.title: Games
matches.description: We participate in practice games and tournaments with other local teams to gain practical experience.

events.title: Events
events.description: We also have team camps and parent-child events to enrich activities beyond baseball.

1.title: Now Recruiting New Members for 2025 Season
1.content: We are recruiting new members for the upcoming year. Open to elementary school students from grades 1 to 6. Visits and trial sessions are welcome anytime.

2.title: Results of Spring Friendly Match
2.content: We won 3-2 in the friendly match with Minato Ward team held last weekend. Everyone showed excellent performance.

3.title: Change of Practice Location
3.content: Starting from October, our practice location will change to Koto Ward Sports Center. Details will be provided by coaches for each grade.

team.title: Our Coaching Staff
team.description: Meet our experienced coaching staff at Sakura Baseball Club. Our dedicated coaches support the growth and development of each child across different teams.

team_descriptions.A: This team is for 5th and 6th graders. We focus on gaining game experience and improving technical skills and competitiveness.
team_descriptions.B: This team is for 3rd and 4th graders. We establish basic techniques and develop practical skills through game experience.
team_descriptions.C: This team is for 1st and 2nd graders. Our goal is to introduce the fun of baseball and develop fundamental movements.

join.title: Join Us
join.description: Sakura Baseball Club is always looking for new members, from beginners to experienced players. Feel free to visit and try anytime.
